text: @EnvAgency So how do you justify the use of these when there is little or no rainfall?  It is a scandalous disgrace that water companies can discharge raw sewage into our waterways.

@CleanIlkley @KarenShackleto5 @EnvAgency In March’18, at Ben Rhydding STW (Ilkley, 1km) 2 days had exceptional rainfall but spills occurred on 24. Many spills occur with no or negligible rainfall.
